GameManager¶

class GameManager¶

Manages the game flow and battle logic.

This class handles the initialization of the game, the battle loop, and the interaction between the Hero and the Monster.

Public Functions

GameManager()¶

Constructor for GameManager.

Initializes the random number generator.

void start()¶

Starts the game.

Sets up the characters and begins the battle loop.

Private Functions

void battle()¶

Executes the main battle loop.

Continues until either the Hero or the Monster is defeated.

void heroTurn()¶

Executes the Hero's turn.

Handles player input for attacking or using skills.

void monsterTurn()¶

Executes the Monster's turn.

Handles the monster's AI logic.

void showStatus()¶

Displays the current status of the characters.

Private Members

std::unique_ptr<Hero> hero¶

Pointer to the player's Hero.

std::unique_ptr<Monster> monster¶

Pointer to the enemy Monster.

Implementation (src/core/GameManager.cpp):

 1#include "core/GameManager.h"
 2#include "utils/Dice.h"
 3#include <iostream>
 4#include <limits>
 5
 6GameManager::GameManager() {
 7    Dice::init();
 8}
 9
10void GameManager::start() {
11    std::cout << "Welcome to the RPG Battle Simulator!" << std::endl;
12    std::string name;
13    std::cout << "Enter Hero's name: ";
14    std::cin >> name;
15
16    hero = std::make_unique<Hero>(name, 100, 20, 30);
17    hero->addSkill(Skill("Fireball", 10, 30, SkillType::ATTACK));
18    hero->addSkill(Skill("Heal", 8, 40, SkillType::HEAL));
19
20    monster = std::make_unique<Monster>("Goblin", 80, 15);
21
22    std::cout << "A wild " << monster->getName() << " appeared!" << std::endl;
23    battle();
24}
25
26void GameManager::battle() {
27    int turn = 1;
28    while (!hero->isDead() && !monster->isDead()) {
29        std::cout << "\n--- Turn " << turn << " ---" << std::endl;
30        showStatus();
31
32        heroTurn();
33        if (monster->isDead()) break;
34
35        monsterTurn();
36        if (hero->isDead()) break;
37
38        turn++;
39    }
40
41    if (hero->isDead()) {
42        std::cout << "\n" << hero->getName() << " was defeated... Game Over." << std::endl;
43    } else {
44        std::cout << "\n" << monster->getName() << " was defeated! You Win!" << std::endl;
45    }
46}
47
48void GameManager::showStatus() {
49    std::cout << hero->getName() << " - HP: " << hero->getHp() << "/" << hero->getMaxHp() 
50              << " MP: " << hero->getMp() << "/" << hero->getMaxMp() << std::endl;
51    std::cout << monster->getName() << " - HP: " << monster->getHp() << "/" << monster->getMaxHp() << std::endl;
52}
53
54void GameManager::heroTurn() {
55    std::cout << "Choose action: 1. Attack  2. Skill" << std::endl;
56    int choice;
57    while (true) {
58        std::cout << "> ";
59        std::cin >> choice;
60        if (std::cin.fail()) {
61            std::cin.clear();
62            std::cin.ignore(std::numeric_limits<std::streamsize>::max(), '\n');
63            continue;
64        }
65
66        if (choice == 1) {
67            hero->attack(*monster);
68            break;
69        } else if (choice == 2) {
70            const auto& skills = hero->getSkills();
71            std::cout << "Choose skill:" << std::endl;
72            for (size_t i = 0; i < skills.size(); ++i) {
73                std::cout << i + 1 << ". " << skills[i].getName() 
74                          << " (MP: " << skills[i].getMpCost() << ")" << std::endl;
75            }
76            std::cout << "0. Back" << std::endl;
77
78            int skillChoice;
79            std::cout << "> ";
80            std::cin >> skillChoice;
81
82            if (skillChoice > 0 && skillChoice <= (int)skills.size()) {
83                const auto& skill = skills[skillChoice - 1];
84                if (hero->payMp(skill.getMpCost())) {
85                    hero->useSkill(skill, *monster);
86                    break;
87                } else {
88                    std::cout << "Not enough MP!" << std::endl;
89                }
90            }
91        }
92    }
93}
94
95void GameManager::monsterTurn() {
96    monster->performAction(*hero);
97}
